coalesce.title: Blind Tiger Tastings
coalesce.event_description: Make sure to stop by Obscuras Imaginarium in the evenings for special tastings of our prohibition cocktails. While tasting history, enjoy the ambiance of silent films and deep house music in our cenimatorium or relax in our Victorian red room plounge.

coalesce.title: Cards Against Humanity
coalesce.event_description: The great family game! Come hang out with chosen family and soon to be friends for a peek into our Bigger Blacker Box.  Fun for all ages.

coalesce.title: Ving Tsun for Everyone [Family Friendly]
coalesce.event_description:
My recent hyperfixation is Ving Tsun, might it be yours too? 
Ages 5+ (with adult) and physical abilities welcome to join us in connecting mind and body. I'll be guiding the first part of the first form (Siu Nim Tau), 8 basics and pak sau each day. 
Consider bringing water and a hand towel.

coalesce.title: Lakes of Fire Greeters Annual FOOD DRIVE
coalesce.event_description:
Show us your cans !!!

Are you cooking for everyone, or just for your Lakes of Fire camp? 

Take a moment to grab an extra can or two or ten, for our food donation project. Practice some Civic Responsibility and give back to the community we call home each year.

 All food is being donated to the Trinity Community Pantry in New Era Michigan. This food bank provides more than 4,500 lbs of food to more than 180 families every week. This area of Michigan has one of the highest hunger rates and you can help!

 The "Greeter Station" and ONLY the Greeter Station  will be accepting the food donations through the whole event up to 4 p.m. on Sunday exodus. 

We want to see your cans !  Last year we donated over 800 LBS to the New Era Food Pantry, WAY TO GO LAKES OF FIRE, lets keep up the awesome momentum! ! ! ! !

 Requirements:
Unopened Non-perishable Cans are preferred, No glass please.

Also welcome are unopened unused toiletries.

Shampoos, soap. toothbrushes, toothpaste, deodorant etc. are also sorely needed.

If you have any question flag down Mistress Colleen, Co. Lead of Greeeters, they/them, she/her will be more than happy to talk to you about this project.

coalesce.title: The Magic Gathering
coalesce.event_description:
Whip out your Decks and come have a Magical Gathering with us! Join us for a daily 2 hour block of Magic The Gathering free play! 

While you're there, sign up for the Tournament on Saturday at 12:30pm. Sign up closes Saturday at 10am. Tournament is EDH/Commander format.

coalesce.title: Low stakes talent show!
coalesce.event_description: Do you have a talent (or lack thereof) that you’d like to showcase but not make a big deal out of it? New material you’re just trying out? Just wanna see people do weird stuff? Come on down!

coalesce.title: Break-xodus
coalesce.event_description:
Sunday morning-ish. You've packed your kitchen. But you're staring at camp tear down, and hours on the road. 

We Will Fuel Your Exodus.

Sunday morning, 9:00 am until we run out of food. Bacon, eggs, bagels, gluten free bites, cereal bar, juice, coffee (optional alcoholic additives), and whatever else we can pull together.

coalesce.title: Shibari 201
coalesce.event_description: In this class I’ll have a quick review for anyone who took my 101 class and then we will dive into a basic hip harness and if there’s time a arms in front chest harness. There will be some rope available to borrow, but supply is limited so please bring 2 or 3 hanks of rope, ideally 25 feet long, if you have them.

coalesce.title: Spanks & Dranks
coalesce.event_description: Spanks & Dranks - Seventh year back for our playful daily bar time featuring games and giveaways, drinks, and playful spanks that are in no way mandatory.

coalesce.title: Wonder Cat Brunch
coalesce.event_description: Hey all you pretty kittez, cool cats, feral frenz... come find us at Coco Jumbo National Park in the beautiful lands of San Escobar Furiday at 11 am. Make sure to bring your favorite food bowl for some snacks and a cup for a bubbly meowmosa! Coco Jumbo is home to many strays who are looking for new homes- adopt don't shop!
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: The Temple Burn
coalesce.event_description: The Temple of Regeneration is a place to seek solace and peace. Breathe deeply and allow yourself to relax. Allow yourself to feel the emotions that come. This is a place to remember love, find release and rebirth.  A reminder that life is a cycle of birth, death, and rebirth. The pinecone is a symbol of this cycle. It falls from the tree, burns in the fire, and opens to reveal new life. Gather a pinecone to place and be burned with the Temple on Sunday at 8am.

coalesce.title: Vacation Crafting School
coalesce.event_description: All ages come by and pick a craft to do while learning about our 13 Sacred Unicorns, Tenets and ways to become a member of our Blessing. Snacks might be served if we remember.🦄 Neigh, Neigh Neighmaste

coalesce.title: DND Character Building Class
coalesce.event_description:
Newcomers: come learn how to build a character. We'll supply everything you need, including your first set of dice!
Experienced players: use our resources to create a character so you can play in our daily oneshot!

coalesce.title: DRENCH THE WENCH
coalesce.event_description: Hear ye, hear ye! Partake in the first annual spectacle of tshirts being wetted with a myriad of chests beneath them! Participate or simply enjoy the show!

coalesce.title: KY Derby Vibrator Dildo Races
coalesce.event_description: KY Derby vibrator dildo races on Friday and Saturday at 2:00 p.m. sharp! Location: Recess Camp #122-124.  Dress in your best Kentucky Derby outfit and bring your OWN vibrator to race. Gifts for winners and participants, drinks, and DJ!  No individual bullet vibrators allowed. Feel free to fancy up your vibrator!

coalesce.title: Magic The Gathering Tounament
coalesce.event_description: Sign up by 10am on Saturday to participate in a Magic The Gathering Tournament! EDH/Commander format only. Prize(s) to be announced!

coalesce.title: Lakes of Fire Pronoun Project
coalesce.event_description: Lakes of Fire is dedicated taking a more inclusive stance by acknowledging  gender diversity at our event.  By allowing individuals to represent themselves with their preferred pronouns, we can establish authentic and personal connections right from the start.  Stop by the Greeter's Station anytime while the gate is open and pick up a pronoun button.  You will be able to write your preferred pronouns on the button and wear it throughout  the event.  We encourage all gender identities to participant in order to provide an all inclusive environment  for everyone.

coalesce.title: What I Wanted to Say...
coalesce.event_description: Here's your moment to get it all out, everything you wanted to say. Plant it to Let it Grow, Burn it to Let it Go. With seed paper, your words will bloom into new life. With flame paper, they will be set free with the burning effigy. Put intention into it, and set it free.

coalesce.title: Steely Dan & Steel Reserve
coalesce.event_description: Come listen to the sounds of the 70's and 80's represented best by Steely Dan!  We will be chilling with a variety of beers and not just Steel Reserve so come out and groove with Steely Dan and brews.

coalesce.title: *~TOPLESS BODY PAINTING AND MOCKTAILS~*
coalesce.event_description: Cinder and friends need human canvases, you need to hydrate, come get your titties litty or your body oddied!! **FIRE EMOJI**
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Cathedral of Sorrow & Fears [burn]
coalesce.event_description: Throughout the week, people have helped us build our Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears.  Tonight we hold a solemn ceremony and release the hurt.

coalesce.title: The Hedge Shoppe - Tarot, Spells, and Gifts
coalesce.event_description: THE WITCH IS IN! (Site M) Daily tarot and energy readings offered, create a flower spell jar filled with magic and intention, participate in the Bay Leaf Ritual, or join us for tea and other gifts! Offerings may change daily and you might find the Witch of the Shoppe wandering the Lake with her cards as well.

coalesce.title: Plant Powered Garden ParTEA
coalesce.event_description: Grab your favorite teacup and saucer/plate and join us at Camp Recharge for our Garden ParTEA with plant-forward fare. Come as you are, or wear your fancy tea time attire! We'll offer a few types of iced tea & vegetarian/vegan eats and sweets.

coalesce.title: San Escobar Welcoming Party
coalesce.event_description: Ribbon Cutting & Margareets!
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Jingles Emporium
coalesce.event_description:
Jingles Emporium returns this year providing those necessary, hard-to-find, and late-night items.  We have cigs, lighters, TP, antacids, tampons, floss, water, gum, sanitizer, wipes, and more! Look for daily drink specials! Located at the baby trailer, at the corner of Section H in the East End. 
Open 24 hours a day.
The Emporium is a panda friendly establishment.

coalesce.title: Intention Setting Circle
coalesce.event_description: A Burn is much more than a party, it's a ritual of letting go and release.  As we Burn the effigy that we collectively build we Burn away parts of ourselves we no longer need, releasing what is dead to make room for new things to grow.  Come witness and be witnessed in community as we share what it is we have brought to sacrifice to the flame.  Share with words or show an object you plan to feed to the fire.  We will also have a board where you can write your intentions that we will Burn on the Burn night.

coalesce.title: Bee Swarm Vahalla
coalesce.event_description: Are you ready for this?  It's the time for the Bees to really fly! Join us at Vahalla for a Swarm!

coalesce.title: Bee Swarm Vahalla
coalesce.event_description: Are you ready for this?  It's the time for the Bees to really fly! Join us at Vahalla for a Swarm!

coalesce.title: Watch for the Maiden of Wake: The Third Day
coalesce.event_description:
You’ll find her wandering by foot, under canopy of green. Only in the light of day, are all her colors seen. On the first day she will appear, with the second day she blooms. By third she takes her final form, as light at last consumes. Should you find her on the third day, she carries something different.
Show her a familiar token, and she may share with you this trinket. Be wary that this last of gifts, is more challenging to find. Only 7 will unearth the truth. It will be those with open mind.

coalesce.title: Watch for the Maiden of Wake
coalesce.event_description:
As you tread the path round the shores of the lake,  
may you hope to spot somewhere the Maiden of Wake.  You’ll find her wandering by foot, 
under canopy of green.
Only in the light of day,
are all her colors seen.
On the first day she will appear,
with the second day she blooms.
By third she takes her final form,
as light at last consumes.
On your journey you may find useful,
a token that she carries.
Should you ask of her a quest,
may you be rewarded merrily.

coalesce.title: Light it Up
coalesce.event_description: Wood, Propane, Candles ~ All the flame! All night long!

coalesce.title: Heart Circle
coalesce.event_description: Heart Circle is a place to witness and be witnessed in community, to share what is on your Heart in a space where you know you will not be judged, no advice will be given, no one will try and 'fix' you.  The power of being held and witnessed from the Heart is transformative experience.  Come share your experience in a Sacred and Safe space.

coalesce.title: Experimental Family Dinner
coalesce.event_description: Feelin’ hangry? Skip the pb&j and join the Experimental Family Tree for dinner tonight! Our chefs will serve up some delectable vegan goodies. Bring your bowl and we’ll fill it with chili and cornbread, banh mi, Korean lentils, or tacos!

coalesce.title: Foot Fetish Friday
coalesce.event_description: You like feet? There are people who are making me write this who like to have their feet fondled. Clean feet and couches provided for you to do stuff to. Come with your clean feet and see if you find your opposite match.

coalesce.title: Music!
coalesce.event_description:
We will have performers from 8pm until 2am on Thursday.  As follows: 
8pm Alex Simmons (dnb)
9pm J Rose (vocal looping)
10pm Certified Scruffian (Multi Genre dj)
11pm Saxony (multi genre dj)
12 am-2 Audeo/Trailblazer B2B (multi genre djs)

coalesce.title: San Escobarrian Naval Gazing Finals
coalesce.event_description: Times may vary...
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Absinthe Ritual and Tasting
coalesce.event_description: Join Marco and Co in learning about and tasting of absinthe (aka absinth, absynthe, and absenta.) Learn nearly everything you wanted to know about the Green Fairy, ~and~ you get to savor it after experiencing the ritual of preparation.

coalesce.title: Golden Hour Photoshoot
coalesce.event_description: Join us for a sunset photoshoot with professional photographer, Smokey, and the whole Garden of Sluts family. Open to everyone, dress your best and we'll provide the rest! Let Smokey's artistic lens bring out your inner fire and create stunning memories!

coalesce.title: San Escobarrian Naval Gazing Quarter Finals
coalesce.event_description: Times may vary...
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: San Escobarrian Naval Gazing Semi Finals
coalesce.event_description: Times may vary...
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Bloody Mary's with Wonder Cat Brunch
coalesce.event_description: Friday morning Hair of the Dog or kick start! Teaming up with San Escobar and the Slippery Pickle for all your nutritional and limbic brain needs, we offer our 5th annual Bloody Mary's Wisconsin style. Bring your cup if you want more than our serving size.

coalesce.title: Flamingolo
coalesce.event_description: Ride a costumed flamingo while playing polo through croquet wickets...Flamingolo! We're Downtown #130. Come by anytime. The Court is always open. 1) Choose your Flamingo. 2) Pick a mallet and a matching ball. 3) Mount your Flamingo and "ride" onto the court. 4)  Place ball at Wicket #1 5) Use a one handed swing to hit ball through wickets as numbered 6) Take turns 7) Have fun!

coalesce.title: Brunch of the Gods!
coalesce.event_description: Skol Burners! As you awake Saturday morning we at Valhalla have just the thing to ready you for the last day of Burning- breakfast. Swing by Valhalla to fill you cup, stomach, and hearts for our annual BRUNCH OF THE GODS! We will go hard until our larder buckles or you do!

coalesce.title: Liminal Libations
coalesce.event_description: Description: Come while away these strange in-between hours with Type O Negative milk punch, Early Grey G&Ts, or one of our other peculiar unlabelled liqueurs. Nibble tea-brined chicken and mushroom skewers or lemon lavender shortbread while you contemplate the night's debauchery. You need fortification to haunt the night properly.

coalesce.title: Midnight Sound Garden Jam at Garden of Fire
coalesce.event_description: Bring an instrument, your voice, a story to tell, or just little ol' you and some loving vibes. Let's gather 'round the fire(s) for some later night music and stories together.

coalesce.title: Find the wild Pooka
coalesce.event_description:
If you find a magical creature roaming the Lake say the magic words and be rewarded with a prize. Careful there are numerous Fae folk in these woods so be sure to find the right one. "

"Harvey the Field Applications Engineer."

coalesce.title: Together Grief Gathering
coalesce.event_description: A grief circle to honor any big changes, losses, or longings. We’ll create an beautifully impermanent holding container for our feels and play with some unique ways to authentically  relate to ourselves and each other.  Grief heals best in community. Come gather with us, share and connect. You don’t have to hold it alone.

coalesce.title: Blossoms of the Spoken Word
coalesce.event_description: Join a circle to share stories, poems, affirmations, secrets, and scandals. Or just come and listen.

coalesce.title: <3 Daytime CUDDLING
coalesce.event_description: Bring a blanket, hammock, or chill in the grass. Come with a partner(s) or come solo. Daytime consensual cuddling to feel good for the rest of the day. Consent is key and can be withdrawn at any time.

coalesce.title: Get Married… (For fun!)
coalesce.event_description: Marry your guitar, a best friend, a total stranger, 4 people together, or an idea/intention. Wacky fun and lighthearted ceremony with a definitely-not-ordained Priestess. Vows/marriage "certificate" to take home, photo op in the heart-shaped archway, & special gift for the celebrants. Sign up at Camp Heart On for short 5ish minute ceremonies or just show up.

coalesce.title: A Valhalla! Wedding
coalesce.event_description: Come celebrate the wedding of Gruber and Molly in Valhalla! Of COURSE you're invited, and what better way to kick off a Wednesday night! There will be cake. And kazoos.

coalesce.title: Bar of the Gods!
coalesce.event_description: Yep, we have a bar and we are delighted to fill your cups!

coalesce.title: Axe Throwing
coalesce.event_description: Have you had the pleasure of throwing an axe (at a target)? Well come to Valhalla and we will celebrate your prowess... or at the very least your determination.

coalesce.title: Copycats Costuming
coalesce.event_description: Peruse this gift shop of wearable delights and find costumes for events around the Lake! Or try to replace something you forgot. Check back often as the racks change daily! If you have donations, we accept them in our "stockroom" behind the "shop". (But please don't bring us ants! 😬 ) For newbies, it may look like a shop, but these wearables are gifts from us and your fellow campers around the lake! 🎁  No money. 🤗 Things for adults and kids too!
coalesce.hosting_location: Copycats Costume Camp (village with The Gayborhood)

coalesce.title: Coffee, Caftans and Handfans
coalesce.event_description: Are you all ready for coffee and caftans? We’re excited to be bringing this event back with a twist!  We’ll be serving up a bountiful array of fresh baked magic, including Lambchops famous coffee cake that melts in your mouth. We’re teaming up with those caffeinators, Snackdaddy and Midwhippet (aka Stellar Espress-o from Lakes in Space) to give you a boost with some  espresso and maybe even an affogato. So, don your favorite caftan, grab your hand fan and come hang out. If you don’t have a caftan, no worries, we’re teaming up with the  Funkyard to bring you the cream of the crop in caftans. Why bring a hand fan? Come find out. Our hand fan professionals will be waiting for you.

coalesce.title: t4t4tea - a tea mixer for trans people, by trans people
coalesce.event_description:
Join Safe Zone's T4T4Tea event for an afternoon of connection, camaraderie, and delightful tea! This trans-only social mixer fosters community and meaningful connections. Engage in speed-friending, meet like-minded individuals, and deepen connections through Ester Perel's card game "Where Should We Begin?" Celebrate your trans identity in a safe, transgender-centered atmosphere. Experience empowerment, warmth, acceptance, and unity over a cup of tea. 

Note: In the name of radical inclusion and equity, T4T4Tea is safe space exclusively for individuals who fall under the trans umbrella, a marginalized class under the oppression of cis-normalcy. Respectfully, cisgender attendees are not permitted <3

coalesce.title: Duck Hunt
coalesce.event_description: Beware of the invading ducks that have taken over our theme camps! Can you locate all the hidden ducks before they cause more chaos? Each camp that signed up has one special duck hidden in their community space. 🦆 Can your team find the most? Head on over to Safe Zone to sign up for the hunt!

coalesce.title: Queer Euphoria Lounge
coalesce.event_description: Welcome to Safe Zone's Queer Euphoria Lounge! Discover our diverse selection of alcohol-free beverages at our juice bar, or opt for a something extra at our separate shot bar. Mix and match drinks, groove to smooth jams, and connect with our awesome community. Make new friends in this inclusive and vibrant space for all!

coalesce.title: Bubbles'Bums'N'Bass
coalesce.event_description: Tribute to one of our favourite camps, we'll be spinning tunes and serving bubbly with lots of bubbles. If you're feeling cheeky, we'll be painting bums! Bring a cup!

coalesce.title: Group Stretchies
coalesce.event_description: slow and warming flows to say good morning to our bodies, working into some more vigorous movements which will prepare our bodies for the silliness and sassiness of the day! lots of hip and spine mobility. Most likely will lead into some core work, because happy backs require a strong core if you're gonna walk and dance all day long!

coalesce.title: Kozy Vegan Happy Hour
coalesce.event_description: Come to Sad Kids Club and be warm and cozy with vegan Chili, Spiced Cider, and Good Company. This is the happiest Sad Kids Club will be all event, see us at our best. Alcoholic & Non-Alcoholic Cider will be served.

coalesce.title: Mobile Blacksmith Shop
coalesce.event_description: Stop by the Mobile Blacksmith Shop to watch demonstrations, ask questions and maybe even get a chance to get your hand on a hammer and tongs to make something yourself.  We will be doing both Blacksmithing and Pewter sand casting multiple times a day, Wednesday through Saturday, stop by to find out exact times as they are subject to change.

coalesce.title: Beach Meat - Syncytium x DCBBQ
coalesce.event_description: Delicious beach meat featuring DJ Grumpy Fuck playing some old school goth music.

coalesce.title: Hype It Up Hour
coalesce.event_description: Come to Camp Squish for "Hype it Up Hour" and we will Hype. You. Up!

coalesce.title: Lounging At Squish
coalesce.event_description: Need some shade? Wanna get cozy and lounge around? Come by the Lounge at Camp Squish, check for daily open hours at our camp!

coalesce.title: Sewing and Screen Prints and Weeffigies, Oh My!
coalesce.event_description: You aren't in Kansas anymore.  This year, the Nexus has been transformed in a whirlwind of growth.  It has become a dedicated arts, learning, and community space.  Improved screen printing, a make-and-take foraging bag workshop, and a community Wee Effigy build are but a few of the treats that await you.  Ask at the Help Desk for more details about workshop times and availability.  Bring your creativity - we're ready for you!

coalesce.title: Punk Rock Power Hour
coalesce.event_description: Are you crying? Good. Cry. You'll piss less. Watch Sad Kids Club transform to Mad Kids Club. Listen to some punks both old and new while we all drink on the minute to quell our inner rage. Throw your middles fingers up and send out a "Fuck you" to the universe with us. Let's be real, the universe has earned it.

coalesce.title: Emo Night
coalesce.event_description: A celebration of all things alternative, Emo Night will be a night of dancing and sing-alongs hosted by Sad Kids Club. Come listen to all of your favorite emo and pop-punk classics as we serve emo-themed drinks at our bar! Non-alcoholic options will be available as well.

coalesce.title: 4:20, Skank:30
coalesce.event_description: You caught the Reel Big Fish! I'm sure the feeling must be Sublime. We hate to be The Interrupters, but we don't want you to find yourself in a Catch 22. Come to Sad Kids Club to embrace the brass and listen to some ska hits! If you don't love the music, you'll appreciate the greenery.

coalesce.title: My Tie Mai Tais
coalesce.event_description: Wear your cheesiest tie and bring a good story to go with it or one will be provided for you at your peril.  Serving genuine Mai Tais till we run out of rum  Your taste buds never had it so good.

coalesce.title: Nostalgic Movie Night
coalesce.event_description: Spend your last night at Lakes of Fire relaxing and indulging in the golden era of cinema. The Phantom of the Opera from 1925 will be screened on the big screen, transporting you to a bygone era.

coalesce.title: Brand New Buddy Bench
coalesce.event_description: Come by and make a brand new buddy! If you see just one person there, be sure to stop by and meet your brand new buddy! If no one's there, hang out and wait for your new buddy to stop by!

coalesce.title: Pride Parade
coalesce.event_description:
Join Camp Squish for a Pride Parade at Lakes! Dress in your pride gear and celebrate queerness in community! This is a Stuffy-Friendly event! Camp Squish encourages folks to bring their favorite stuffed animal or childhood treasure along for the parade! 
Meet at the Keyhole entrance @ 5pm on Friday to begin our Gay Parade to Superfriends Camp and end dancing to lineup of queer DJs!

coalesce.title: COT13U Ice Cream Social
coalesce.event_description: Join us Thursday after our Ceremonial Celebration for alcohol infused (can be virgin too) ice cream and sherbet floats. This year's offerings are orange or strawberry. I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream. Don't forget your vessel! Neighmaste

coalesce.title: Chill with your Gnomies
coalesce.event_description:
Stop by Baked on the Lake and chill with your Gnomies while out foraging about the Garden of Wonder. Come relax on our fungtastic patio and be immersed in our magical garden cafe.  If you find yourself with a magical trinket given to you by one of our gnomes make sure and ask about the "secret garden" soirée. 
(We will close up shop from time to time so our gnomes can enjoy the lake and all of the other magical wonders of Lucky Lake. Our white board will let you know when we’ll be back and ready to greet you)

coalesce.title: Vice Cart
coalesce.event_description: Need a drink? Need a smoke? Need a spanking? Need some munchies? We've got all your vices covered! Look for the traveling Vice Cart to satisfy your debaucherous desires.

coalesce.title: Robe Life Dance Party
coalesce.event_description: Come join us at Dewey Decibels for our "Robe Life" happy hour dance party! Come dressed in your favorite robes, dusters, or exoctic vests! Don't have one? Grab one of ours from our "Take a Robe, Leave a Robe" station! Music will be bumpin', drinks will be flowin' (N/A available), and Robe Life vibes will be on high.

coalesce.title: Wake up with COFFEE UP
coalesce.event_description:
"Wake up with Coffee Up
Coffee Up is serving up fresh coffee officially Thurs/Fri/Sat from 8am-11am and unofficially whenever there is hot coffee in the carafe. We'll also have hot water available for tea, hot cocoa, etc... "

coalesce.title: COT13U- A Gala-oping Gathering
coalesce.event_description: We invite ALL devotees to join us for our 1st Annual Blessing Bash to celebrate our cult's...ummm church's increased membership at Lakes. Join us for a unicorn themed food snackuterie to titillate your taste buds or just put you in a sugar coma. Neighmaste to all devotees and believers.

coalesce.title: Come Get Loved
coalesce.event_description: What is your love language? Come find out your love language and let us love you.

coalesce.title: Solicited Advice
coalesce.event_description: Have you ever had a problem, life question, fashion dilemma, or general malaise and just wished someone would tell you what to do? Now someone will! Come by "Drink Bitch!",  and ask for Nancy. Share your issue and get her candid solicited advice.

coalesce.title: Moth Tea Time
coalesce.event_description: Enjoy tea served by the Moth People in the Atmospheria garden.

coalesce.title: Moth Tea Time
coalesce.event_description: Enjoy tea served by the Moth People in the Atmospheria garden.

coalesce.title: Juggling Break!
coalesce.event_description: Can I juggle? Fuck no. Do I have 3 nice balls? Sure do. Stop in to play with my balls and show off your sweet skills.

coalesce.title: Boudoir Photo Shoot
coalesce.event_description: A boudoir photo shoot is a unique and empowering experience that celebrates the beauty, confidence, and sensuality of individuals. Participants can enjoy a private and comfortable setting, capturing stunning images that highlight their personality and allure. Participants can express their individuality and create intimate, tasteful photographs that evoke elegance and self-assurance.

coalesce.title: Taco Freshtival
coalesce.event_description: Tboyfresh will be slinging his infamous Chorizo + Egg Tacos, come by jam out, and get some! Chayote option for my vegan friends
coalesce.hosting_location: Deep in the Key, Likely in the Woods!

coalesce.title: Burner Passport Agency
coalesce.event_description: Let our travel agents chart your next intergalactic adventure, and pose for the most widely accepted form of personalized photo ID in the known burniverse! From the makers of the MULTIPASS.

coalesce.title: Rock Painting
coalesce.event_description: Rock painting is a creative activity where participants transform ordinary rocks into colorful works of art using acrylic paints, markers, and pens. Participants can unleash their imagination and create unique designs on the rocks, whether it's intricate patterns, landscapes, inspirational messages, or cute animals. The finished rock paintings can be displayed indoors or outdoors, spreading joy and surprise to others who discover them.

coalesce.title: -Mandela Painting
coalesce.event_description: Mandala painting is a meditative and artistic activity that involves creating intricate and symmetrical designs on a circular canvas using vibrant colors, brushes, and pens. Participants can explore their inner creativity as they focus on each stroke, filling the canvas with patterns, symbols, and geometric shapes. This mindful practice not only produces stunning visual art but also offers a therapeutic experience, promoting relaxation and self-expression.

coalesce.title: -Bubbly Brunch
coalesce.event_description: Indulge in a delightful and bubbly brunch experience filled with mimosas and delectable treats. Gather with friends or loved ones in a relaxed setting, sipping on refreshing mimosas.

coalesce.title: Flights of Fancy
coalesce.event_description:
Flip out with us!
With an aerial rig as your wings, come experiment with motion in 3-dimensional space.  Flyers can spin, flip, and vary their height and speed.  Come fly with us!

coalesce.title: Party Into Tomorrow! The Hangover Friendly Stretch Sesh
coalesce.event_description: A gentle, casual primal movement session to help any early hangovers and get our bodies ready to be our absolute best party animals. Follow along as I demonstrate simple movements to get you back in the game.

coalesce.title: Art at the Heart - Closing Ritual
coalesce.event_description:
♥️Come put a little art in your heart at Camp Heart On ! Join Art Therapist Mira of Broken Mirror Healing to craft wood and wire hearts wrapped with yarn .

The opening ritual will set the intentions for the Burn . It will be an opportunity for an art healing session with Mira , complete with guided meditation and group process . 

Open Crafting throughout the Burn will grow this ongoing piece of Interactive Installation Art . All are welcome and invited to create liberally at our Art Table . We invite the denizens of the forest to come together through this mindful and creative art process and ponder the question:

"What activates your heart ? "

Make a Heart ! Take a Heart ! Leave a Heart ! And let’s weave love in our time together . 
Those doing marriage rituals at the chapel of the heart-shaped arch  are encouraged to wrap a heart representing their love . The Yarn Hearts left with us will be displayed around Camp Heart On as a Community Collaborative Art Piece , growing in size and complexity throughout the Burn . 

The closing ritual will tie everything together and involve a ceremonial burn of some of the hearts . Come get your art on ! ♥️


Opening Ritual : July 12th . 
Open Crafting : Throughout the Burn . 
Closing Ritual : July 15th  .

coalesce.title: Postcards From the Future
coalesce.event_description: Visit our crashed airplane to engage in time travel - by sending a postcard to your future self, or a future friend. Decorate, write, and address mail that we will put actual postage on and send sometime after Lakes ends!

coalesce.title: Throwback Grilled Cheese
coalesce.event_description:
[whenever we're in the mood]

Nothing to do with anything but melty goodness. No whole-grain nonsense, no artisanal cheese, no fancy add-ins, just the toasty, gooey glory of a sandwich made by the latchkey kids we once were.

coalesce.title: Releasing Tension with Somatics
coalesce.event_description: Tired of unwanted tension dragging you down? Not even sure how that's happening and want to learn how to gain more freedom, expansion and movement in the body? Learn about your body’s propensity to store unwanted tension and the tools to release it. Gain knowledge on trauma patterns in the body and what to do to prevent yourself from subconsciously storing tension in your flesh vessel. Learn how subtle movements and breath can help release tension and re-regulate your nervous system. This class is great for anyone wanting to reduce tension but also helpful for flow artists and movement based practices to help make movement more efficient and free.

coalesce.title: White Crayon Secret Messages
coalesce.event_description: Unleash your inner spy and engage in a creative activity of crafting secret messages using a white crayon. Participants can use the white crayon to write or draw on white paper, creating invisible messages that can only be revealed through clever techniques. By employing methods such as watercolors or using a marker to color over the hidden message, the invisible markings magically appear, adding an element of mystery and excitement to the experience.

coalesce.title: Wandering Karaoke Bar
coalesce.event_description: Do you love singing old songs in front of strangers? We do too so we got a wagon and were loading it up with a Karaoke machine, homemade fancy ass sodas (with or without liquid courage), and a fine selection of classic tunes for you to choose from. We'll be on the move throughout the week, so keep your peepers peeled and come sing with us!

coalesce.title: Rope for All Bodies
coalesce.event_description: This is a rope workshop led by Jet Everywhere caters to those seeking to tie or be tied with consideration for their body. Whether you have mobility or flexibility challenges, sensory needs, allergies, physical impairments, or are of a size or shape that has made you reconsider if rope is for you... This class exists to show you that rope is for EVERYONE that wants to rope. Especially you and your gorgeous self.

coalesce.title: CALLING ALL KIDS!! LNT MOOP KIDS EVENT! :>
coalesce.event_description: CALLING ALL KIDS!!! Join the LNT Kids event suited for and created by children of all ages, where kids themselves volunteer to help. Crafts! MOOP Scavenger Hunt! Snacks! Educational Activities! Friday -  10:30am to 12:00 pm meeting in the Nexus tent. Snacks will be provided (pack a snack if they have unique dietary needs). Kids 5 and under must have an adult with them.

coalesce.title: PTSD Support Group
coalesce.event_description: Please join LoveRhino for this support group meeting.  Share, process grief, and know that you are among others who understand.

coalesce.title: Rorchest Interpretation
coalesce.event_description: Stop by HippoCampUs to give good vibes and kindly interpret people's Rorchest Prints. Interpretation hours are open 24/7.

coalesce.title: Brippo Float
coalesce.event_description:
Expand your burner community by taking a soak with your friendly neighborhood HippoCampsters and their mascot, the Great and Powerful Brippo! See if you can tame the mighty beast by successfully floating upon their back in the water. Come as you are and make new friends.
Thursday's start time is an estimate. The event will start immediately following Transformative Body Art Show.

coalesce.title: Supervised Napping
coalesce.event_description: Go back to kindergarten! Nap while our Nap Captain keeps an eye on your safety & peace. We have beds, inflatable hammocks, rain & sun shelter. Naps fight the patriarchy.

coalesce.title: Bloody Nevis Mary Hour
coalesce.event_description: start the morning off right with a liquid vitamin infusion.featuring my long loved family recipe. Vodka will be kept separate to allow for virgin drinks.

coalesce.title: Plushie Shibari - Rope 'n Sketch
coalesce.event_description: Two artly activities in one event!  Engage your Japanese bondage rope tying skills (or lack thereof) with your own plushie or use one of ours.  Let’s share tips, stories, and camaraderie over this unique form of art.  And we'll also provide sketching pads, pencils, charcoal, and markers for those who want to draw the bondage plushies!  All levels of expertise welcome.

coalesce.title: Rorchest Print Making and Interpretation
coalesce.event_description:
Stop by HippoCampUs to get your Rorchest interpreted. Dip your chest in ink and post it on our banner for all the burn to see. Burners near and far will come to read your print and give good vibes and kind words based on what they see.  Interpretation hours are open 24/7. Inking 
open once a day at discretion of HippoCampUs with our main event on Saturday from 2-4pm.

coalesce.title: Transformative Body Art Show
coalesce.event_description: Walk the runway a blank canvas, take a dip in the lake of luck, and walk back transformed. You are invited to wear a white t-shirt over as much or as little clothing as you'd like (nudity welcomed) while your fellow burners celebrate the art revealed underneath. All genders and bodies will be celebrated. A limited number of t-shirts will be provided for those without a "blank canvas" of their own.

coalesce.title: Sensory Journey
coalesce.event_description: Experience treats for all your senses. Featuring finger foods, refreshments, signature jello shots. nourish you mind, body and soul at a stop at my garden oasis spa retreat. Receive a shampoo, scalp massage/conditioning treatment and feel the healing art of non sexual touch and stay for the stimulating conversation.

coalesce.title: Meet the FAERIES of the InGenieous Lamp
coalesce.event_description: This year, in honor of the Garden of Wonder theme, Faeries have taken over the lamp, and redecorated it according to their tastes.  A dark garden in a glowing forest awaits those who dare to enter… the faeries have their own special magic and are waiting for you!

coalesce.title: Octopus Garden of the Sea (Cocktail Party)
coalesce.event_description: Visit with the SCUBA divers and have a tasty beverage.  Diving stories and other tall tales encouraged.  Scuba gear or certification NOT required, and all are welcome.  It’s not that big a leap from divers to pirates so, yeah, RUM drinks!  Bring a (drinking) vessel.

coalesce.title: Traveling Tarot with The Empress
coalesce.event_description: Luna will be channeling wisdom from The Empress, the archetypal mother of the tarot who holds space for your dreams, your love, your wonder. Find her at Space Space in the Gayborhood, Castro District or out a-wanderin' with a to-go message just for you.

coalesce.title: Hurricane Party
coalesce.event_description: Shelter in place at the Bayou for our Annual Hurricane Party. Celebrating Mother Nature’s wildest moments!

coalesce.title: Karaoke With Catsie
coalesce.event_description: Come share your inner rockstar with us! Be it an enchanting siren song, group number, rap battle or loud and out of key - You can be anything you want to be at Karaoke With Catsie and Friends!

coalesce.title: SuperTime with Superfriends!
coalesce.event_description:
Come to our SuperBar to replenish your Super-powers w/Super FRESH Super ingredients--FRESH Super N/A available, too! Get FREE Bad Advice from a Super-Villian! + your favorite LOF DJs return, with very Super friends... 

All are welcome, even villains!

* Winner: "Worst Soundcamp Ever" 2022!

coalesce.title: The Downtempo Brunch
coalesce.event_description: Breakfast beats, cooked slowly and served with a heaping portion of bass.  Is there a better way to start the day? Join Dewey Decibels for an exploration into the slower side of the musical spectrum - paired with only the finest brunch accoutrements.  Featuring Fazi, Q, Striz, Duke, Merrick, and Chachi in the booth.

coalesce.title: i will read the leaves in your cup 👽 it is alien tea leaf reading
coalesce.event_description: enjoy some tea and then i your friend ether cowboy will look in your cup and divine meaning from the leaves and convey that to you. a human called it 'tea leaf reading'

coalesce.title: Salsa Dancing
coalesce.event_description: Come by Spice World for a salsa dancing get-together!

coalesce.title: Authentic Relating: Curiosity, Noticing, & Listening
coalesce.event_description: Engage in activities focusing on these ways to build more genuine, deeper connections with one another. Do you feel ready to stretch your social limits just a bit? Make eye contact with a strangers? Come get some practice at saying no and saying yes. Gently bring your mind away from other times and places, to the here-and-now.

coalesce.title: Try Not To Laugh
coalesce.event_description: Jump in the seat and try your best to keep a straight face while our comedians do their best to make you laugh. We'll provide costumes and props or bring your own! Take turns trying to crack up the person in the hot seat with your own silly improv! Or, take your turn in the seat to try to keep a straight face while they make you laugh! This event is for everyone, you don't need experience to try!

coalesce.title: Jazz Cats in Checkered Squares
coalesce.event_description:
Pickup jazz and improv.  All instruments, all levels, all eras welcome.  Take the stage for a solo or come form a band.  It's hip to be square.  Come out and play with the calico cats. 
 (Please stay within the sound policy; no large amps since we're not a sound camp.)

coalesce.title: The Birds and the Bees Bash
coalesce.event_description: Come and get your groove on in our lovely Psilo-LUMINOS mushroom garden with savory noms, honey flavored sweets, and sensually tantalizing charcuterie spread! Our Superfriends neighbors will be spinning some sweet beats to accompany our sexy COCK-tails from the Just the Tip Bar. Engorge your eyes with fun facts about birds and bees, and of course intercourse. Flitter around and hunt for clues in our scavenger hunt to win a secret prize! As always, dress to impress in your most fabulous bird, bee, or buggy outfit. Want to come as your favorite sexual organ? We won't stop you!!!

coalesce.title: Breathwork, Yoga + Cacao!
coalesce.event_description: Facilitated breathwork for the first half, and gentle vinyasa flow for the second half with cacao!

coalesce.title: Morning Meditation in the Lamp
coalesce.event_description: Please join for an unguided meditation hour in the InGenieous Lamp.  There will be no instructions, come in for the whole hour, or just part.  Please be quiet as you enter or leave.  There will be a bell played at 10AM.  There are a few cushions available or bring your own.

coalesce.title: High Tea and Cupspanks!
coalesce.event_description:
Space Space cordially invites you to  HIGH TEA AND CUPSPANKS  at 4:20 on Friday in the Gayborhood, Castro District.

Please adorn thyself in thy galactic best and revel in our sumptuous celestial spread fit for a goddess. Consensually spank a birthday Gaybor and enjoy a cosmic cupcake. You may even meet the Queen of Cups!

coalesce.title: Midnight Pizza and Movies
coalesce.event_description: Come get a fresh slice of pizza from your childhood. Sit and enjoy some classic movies MST3K style.

coalesce.title: Open Heart Communication Through Body Awareness
coalesce.event_description:
Learn how to bring awareness to body sensations while communicating and listening.  You will be guided through a series of exercises that will help you be able to communicate more clearly and with an open heart when facing challenging conversations.  Bring a towel, blanket, yoga mat or chair and a willingness to open your heart!
Teacher: Annie Rose

coalesce.title: Ethical Non-monogamy 101/Q&A/Sharing
coalesce.event_description: "Open Relationships", "Swinging", "Polyamory", and "Relationship Anarchy" are labels that some of us use to describe the ethically non-monogamous way that we relate with our significant others. Whether you've been living ethical non-monogamy for as long as you can remember, or you're totally monogamous but interested in understanding more how all this works, join our informal conversation about life on the spectrum of non-monogamy.

coalesce.title: Bee Swarm Keyhole Krawl
coalesce.event_description: Bee Up and meet up at the Keyhole to Krawl about the camps and see the backside of LOF.... As a Swarm!

coalesce.title: D&D - Gardens of Ynn
coalesce.event_description: One day you may find a strange door in a garden. It wasn’t there yesterday. It may not be there tomorrow. But today it looks as if it’s been there for a hundred years, and above it are written the words The Garden of Ynn. It is surely full of whimsy and no danger at all, come and frolic! Three parts across three days: enjoy, explore, escape! Drop in and out as you like, no experience with D&D necessary.

coalesce.title: Latin  Brunch & Beats in the Garden
coalesce.event_description: Do you gnome what’s better than brunch? Brunch and Beats! And do you gnome what is even better than Brunch & Beats? Our  Latin inspired Brunch & Beats in the Garden.  Come join our crew for tasty treats both sweet and savory, frosty frozen margaritas to cool you down and fresh Latin beats for hip shaking. If you're felling like a dose of espresso we have teamed up with those caffeinators, Snackdaddy and Midwhippet (aka Stellar Espress-o).  It’s time to spice things up in the Garden!

coalesce.title: Calico Croons and Gingham Grooves
coalesce.event_description: Open call to share your acoustic self. Play a tune, sing a song or jam with other burners. Very loose, very supportive atmosphere. Folk songs, campfire songs, kirtan, arias, blues, whatever. All genres welcome. We’ll have a more jazz focused set later in the day.

coalesce.title: Mimosas of Madness
coalesce.event_description: You are cordially invited for mimosas, cocktails, and non-alcoholic drinks. Come for the Unicorns; stay for the mimosas. Find out what all the HYPE is about the Kool-aid. Drink the Kool-aid. All the reviews say it's to DIE for! Once you visit you may never leave. #NotaCult

coalesce.title: High As A Kite Party
coalesce.event_description: Bring Your Own Kite (BYOK) to the north beach Thursday afternoon and sail into the atmosphere!  Our Dewey senses are telling us it will be nice and windy, the perfect time to get down to some heady beats as kites soar through the air!

coalesce.title: Bee Swarm The Effigy
coalesce.event_description:
Inviting all Bees and Bee friends to have a friendly Swarm at the Effigy! Bring a sweet treat to share and let's pollinate the Garden of Wonders! 
Group photos!

coalesce.title: Floatilla of Chaos
coalesce.event_description: After our daily ceremonial celebration, gather with the Unicorns as we chaotically cavort to the lake for a Majestic Floatilla around the lake. All chaos, Unicorns, and flotation devices are encouraged to join. Neighmaste!

coalesce.title: Blessing Celebration
coalesce.event_description: At 1300 hours devotees of COT13U take time to celebrate our Sacred Unicorns, we'll still be setting up our camp but you might see some silliness on the road by our camp.

coalesce.title: An Open Discussion About Consent
coalesce.event_description:
Often referred to as the 11th Principle, Consent always should be front of mind.

During this open talk and workshop, issues revolving around consent will be unpacked and discussed to hopefully bring a greater understanding of what it means and why it is so crucially important.

coalesce.title: Pleasure House Kink Night!
coalesce.event_description:
What's your kink?  Bondage?  Spanking?  Come let your freak flag fly during this fun and special event.  Don't be shy!  Come out and test your limits!

THIS EVENT IS ADULTS ONLY! 21+

AS ALWAYS, CONSENT IS MANDATORY!

coalesce.title: Pleasure House Couples Only Play Party!
coalesce.event_description:
Our Post Burn Party is for couples and groups exclusively.  Gender doesn't matter so long as you are with a play partner.  No singles for this event.

THIS EVENT IS ADULTS ONLY! 21+

AS ALWAYS, CONSENT IS MANDATORY!

coalesce.title: Pleasure House Self Pleasure Party!
coalesce.event_description:
Pleasure House presents a unique play party!

The Self Pleasure Pleasure House party!  For the first two hours of tonight's event we will be focused on Monkey Spanking, Bishop Bopping, Ringing the Devil's Doorbell and other creative euphemisms for the masterbatory arts.

There will be a sex machine for  those brave intrepid souls who dare.

Couple play is allowed but this is a night to be as wild as you want!

THIS EVENT IS STRICTLY ADULTS ONLY.  21+

coalesce.title: Where in San Escobar is Waldo Party!
coalesce.event_description:
Come join us and the Magnificent Waldo? "Looking like him" or not. 
in the breathtaking lands of the Coco Jumbo National Forest, San Escobar. 
For an all vinyl hip hop party! 
Playing nothing but the jams from the 90's and 2000's
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Pleasure House Opening Play Party!
coalesce.event_description:
It's the first night of Lakes of Fire!  This is an adult play party for everyone! Couples!  Singles!  Groups!  Everyone is welcome!  Come play or just hang out in our lounge area.

THIS EVENT IS ADULTS ONLY! 21+

AS ALWAYS, CONSENT IS MANDATORY!

coalesce.title: Scavenger hunt
coalesce.event_description: Open to all ages. Use your powers of perception to find all the things on our list in the Garden of Wonder. Prizes for finishers! Come to us with your completed list on Saturday before the burn starts and we will reward you.

coalesce.title: Day Drinking!!
coalesce.event_description: A cold, 5 gallons of potent MUSHUP juice will be served till gone

coalesce.title: 🌜Late Night Tails🌛
coalesce.event_description: Did you hear a snippet of a story at our Open Mic, and need to hear more? Would you like to spin a tale of your own? Come get cozy and get your storytime on! Cuddle puddle DJ sets likely to follow.

coalesce.title: Create a Mutant Stuffie
coalesce.event_description: Back for its third year! Come create your own mutant stuffie to be your BFF (badass fuzzy freak)! We provide stuffed animals for mutilating and modifying, and tools. You bring your creativity and twisted sense of humour. Good for kids and grownups

coalesce.title: AcroYoga/Partner Acrobatics
coalesce.event_description:
Beginning to advanced level acroyoga and partner acrobatics taught by Joe who has been teaching nationally and internationally for the last 15 years.

Don't need a partner just a willingness to try something new and a desire to make new friends.

coalesce.title: Egg roll Fry
coalesce.event_description: Frying up egg-rolls noon on Friday !!

coalesce.title: Baby Fight Club
coalesce.event_description:
The Baby Fight Club is a festival goer favourite that is packed with tons of viewer interaction and opportunity to get involved with the theme camp’s events itself. 

The BFC theme camp offers a rotation of events that assure you will create tons of laughter, smiles and enjoyment from once coming by to see what we have to offer. 

The theme camps events always arrange in a different style and order than the last festival we were at - keeping the excitement new and fest goers on their toes for even our return fans of our theme camp from past festivals! The BFC crew puts on events that range from our open day-care and baby drop-off bin (not an actual daycare!), take in the Baby Fight Club’s famous "how to Make a baby" seminar, add to our whiteboard meter by making a baby yourself and adding it our total babies made at the festival tally, try blind-dizzy folded baby food sampling (Don’t forget to wear your bib baby!), maybe our bar is open for a baby sized shot, or come join in the action of the live act yourself by becoming a certified Baby Fight Club coach in our coaches training seminars and get yourself a souvenir from the BFC of your very own time stamped coaches certification! 
Also, don’t forget to catch our theme camp’s bookie before you leave to place your bet on which one for the BFC babies is going to win the bout on the grand finale day of the festival! 
Leading into just that - Baby Fight Night!! Come out to our theme camp’s final showcase and event, the "Baby Fight" DJ set and live performance itself! 

Ring babe, cheerleaders, referees, ring side doctors, certified corner coaches, storks - there is no end to what the BFC could bring next!But we can assure we go just as big as the sound on the crews costume before the Baby Fight Night itself! All puppet controlled baby dolls for the Baby Fight night itself will be controlled by two festival goers who became one of our new and most enthusiastic certified coaches who wants to fight a baby LIVE! 

Do you have what it takes to feed a baby when you’re dizzy and blindfolded? 
Do have what it takes to become a certified coach? 
Do you have what it takes to fight a baby?
Want to come to our camp to help us make another baby together? 
Feeling lucky enough to predict the winner Baby fighter on your baby fight bet card? 

We do know you want to drop your baby off inside our baby drop off bin while you run wild all Festival long!!

There is only one way to find out what all the action and hype is all about! Come by our theme camp to check it all out and apply within! 

The Baby Fight Club awaits you…
#👶🏼💥🥊👶🏽

coalesce.title: Tasty Nuts for Your Mouth
coalesce.event_description: Come put our tasty nuts in your mouth! Deez Nutz will be camping in Open Camping with various nuts, dried fruits, and other snacks so hungry burners can build their own trail mixes. Sometimes we have fresh popped popcorn (when we feel like it).

coalesce.title: Pleasure House Multihand Massage
coalesce.event_description: Come lay on one of our massage tables and have a relaxing non-sexual massage administered by many hands.  You are in control as you tell your massagers where it hurts and how hard to rub.  As always, CONSENT IS MANDATORY!  ADULTS ONLY 21+

coalesce.title: Free will clothing
coalesce.event_description: Burner Clothing. Great outfits

coalesce.title: Make a Bracelet, Make A Friend
coalesce.event_description: Come on by to make your own pony bead bracelet to sport all weekend. While you're at it make a new friend stringing beads across the table from you. Crafty community building!

coalesce.title: Bees by the "Sea" Happy Hour
coalesce.event_description: After you are done working hard on the Bee MOOP Loop, head back to the hive for some refreshing beverages & waggle dancing on the BEEch.

coalesce.title: ✨ Open Mic ✨
coalesce.event_description:
Talent not required-- only bravery to get on the mic, and open-ness toward others who do the same! 
                      
Share a song, a story, a poem, a joke, an experimental improv bit, or whatever else your weird heart desires. 

🔥 More info and (optional) sign-ups: 
bit.ly/first-fires-open-mic  🔥

Come back at midnight for the epilogue: Late Night Tails with First Fires

coalesce.title: The Egress
coalesce.event_description: Public access site to the BEEch.

coalesce.title: Fire Jam @ The Fae "Forbidden" Stage
coalesce.event_description: Greet the Sunset with FIRE in your hands and a ring of mushrooms around the Fae "Forbidden" Stage! [Dedicated Beats and Fire Safety Onhand]

coalesce.title: Super Villain Power Hour!
coalesce.event_description:
Villains! Stop by our SuperBar and plot world domination as we prepare to watch things BURN.

* Voted "Worst Soundcamp Ever" 2022!

coalesce.title: Poetry Corner & LOF Scrapbook Site
coalesce.event_description: After spicing up your wardrobe at the FunkYard boutique, stop by the poetry corner to contribute to the 2nd annual LOF Scrapbook, peruse the 2022 Lakes in Space scrapbook, add to the collaborative poetry books, or, post to the positivity "board of wonder" where anything is possible! Daily drink offerings, pop-up photo shoots and more TBD.

coalesce.title: Sea Shanty Sing @ Goblin Cove
coalesce.event_description: ALL ABOARD FOR SHANTY NIGHT! Landlubbers and Sailors of all kind, come meet Friday from 9:30-11:00pm for songbooks and camaraderie! Head-lamps encouraged; songbooks provided. Bring your singing voices and join the refrain!

coalesce.title: Baby Fight DJ set
coalesce.event_description: The title match DJ set!

coalesce.title: BOFFER-MAKING WORKSHOP & MELEE
coalesce.event_description:
A boffer is a padded mock weapon made of PVC & foam insulation.
Daggers, Swords, Staves, & more!
Make your very own boffer to keep and/or join us afterward in a Mock-Battle. All tools&materials will be provided.
Melee reminders:
1- ""ow!"" & ""stop!"" are both safewords.
2- try to *hit your opponents, not *hurt them.
(There will be a 30m lunch break @noon.  Melee begins @12:30pm.)"

coalesce.title: LiminaliTEA
coalesce.event_description: Soothe your senses with our beautiful brews; teas of mint, lemon, earl grey, and mystery. Sate your terrible hunger with sweet skull scones and refreshing cucumber sandwiches (though why do they have that ominous red color?). Cool down, warm up, caffeinate, or just vibe with your fellow vampire.

coalesce.title: Yoga for EveryBODY
coalesce.event_description:
Join Jenna at Lamp Camp for a morning Hatha flow yoga class. Celebrate the day with uplifting and energizing movement combined with relaxing regulation techniques and somatic practices that will leave you feeling blissed out and balanced. 

BYOM (bring your own mat)

coalesce.title: Braille Fun
coalesce.event_description: Are you a creepy goblin or curious hippie? Stop by the (Gar)Den to start your evening off with a spirit reading, fortune, poem, or special request all written in Braille! Translation chart will be provided but if you hate charts, we can probably translate for you.

coalesce.title: Stitch n Bitch in the (Gar)Den!
coalesce.event_description: Bring your yarn and come get crafty at the Den! Crochet with Care Bear, knit with Knit Witch, and make pom poms with Puma from 12-1. Limited supplies will be available for those interested in learning a yarn craft.

coalesce.title: Bar & Hookah
coalesce.event_description: Step through the threshold into our magical garden and sip on some of the finest floral cocktails and mocktails in the land. Stick around and indulge in stories and smoke with hookah. We will open up after the burn if we feel like it 🤷

coalesce.title: Make a baby Seminar
coalesce.event_description: Learn how to make a baby with the BFC crew.

coalesce.title: French Maid Brigaid!
coalesce.event_description:
Join us at Nexus on Saturday at 2pm! We will take a leisurely walk towards effigy, cleaning up the filth that exists along lucky lake. Keyhole seems especially filthy. We shall dust off the dust, burn away the extra baggage, beat some "rugs" and give enthusiastic "oui"s when felt. 

The best thing about the brigade is that you can join us at any time, and assist in the filth cleaning pre-burn. 

See you Saturday!

coalesce.title: F.R.I.E.S. Night
coalesce.event_description:
"F.R.I.E.S. Consent Night. Come join our yummy dance night where we make/giveaway french fries and share about how consent is:
Freely Given
Revocable
Informed
Enthusiastic &
Specific"

coalesce.title: Post-Effigy Fire Jam @ The Fae "Forbidden" Stage
coalesce.event_description: Cryptids+Others+Aliens+Them saying Fare Well to the Lake: Spin Fire one last time upon the Fae "Forbidden" Stage before the Portal within the mushroom ring closes. Starts after Effigy Burn and continues into the Witching Hour. [Dedicated Beats & Fire Safety Onhand]

coalesce.title: CamphrodiTEA @3
coalesce.event_description: Join us @ 3pm for tea & crafts!

coalesce.title: Self-serve Salon
coalesce.event_description: Stop by any time day or night to freshen up or get creative in our self-serve salon!

coalesce.title: Get your TICK on!
coalesce.event_description:
Creepy cool clothing gifts all week long until gone, come and get your TICK on!! We’re happy to tag your apparel too 😃. 
TickTown loves YOU!!

coalesce.title: Manicures & Wine
coalesce.event_description: Sit a spell and enjoy a long-wear shellac manicure crafted by your local Nail Witch. With so many colors, sparkles, and designs to choose from, it's easy to get lost in the sauce, so plan to sit for up to two hours depending on how intricate you'd like your nail art to be. First come first served. If you seek strong medicine, Witch's homegrown red currant wine will be served throughout the day.

coalesce.title: The Hydration Games
coalesce.event_description: Sweating in the sun? Unleash your inner frat bro and soccer mom simultaneously! Play all the classics: Flip Cup, Pong, and Quarters, all with water! No beer, just electrolytes - hydrate competitively!

coalesce.title: Just the Tip
coalesce.event_description: Experience the euphoria of "Just the Tip" at Lamp Camp! Our humble tip has flourished year after year, offering unforgettable encounters and delightful revelry. We're back to intoxicate your senses with tantalizing libations. Indulge in our exquisite cocktails, skillfully crafted with the finest ingredients, or try our mouthwatering non-alcoholic options. Expect everything shaped like genitalia, celebrating the beauty of the human form. Join us on this whimsical journey where desires take shape and the garden of wonders awaits.

coalesce.title: French Maid Brigade!
coalesce.event_description:
The burn is so dirty! We should show up at nexus on Saturday at 2pm, and then we will work our way towards effigy while cleaning every dirty thing on the way. Bring your dusters, your floggers and paddles for rug beating, and your french persona. 

We’re going to work our way through the camps and clean any filthy camps and people. So much dusting, so much rug beating!

This is not child friendly. We are dirty, dirty maids ;)

coalesce.title: Cathedral of Sorrow & Fears [build]
coalesce.event_description:
Time passes and not everything we experience is happy.  It's an important part of life, but it can accumulate into an
oppressive, overwhelming glob.  Sometimes you just want to let some of that go.

Help us build our Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears.  Write things you would like to release on the pieces you use to build the Cathedral.  On Friday night, we'll hold a solemn ceremony burning the Cathedral, letting go of some of the hurt.

coalesce.title: Hurricane Slaps
coalesce.event_description: Are you looking for an invigorating wake-up call? Look no further than Queen Leia's slapping services! Whether you prefer a straight-up slap or a refreshing splash of water, we've got you covered. Take a shot and brace yourself, or simply relax and enjoy the sensation of a rejuvenating face smack. Our team is here to attend to all your slapping needs, so come visit us at Safe Zone.

coalesce.title: Shibari 101
coalesce.event_description: In this class I’ll be teaching shibari safety, a single column tie and some basic frictions. This will also cover some basic bedroom bondage for the curious couple. There will be some rope available to borrow, but supply is limited so please bring a hank of rope, ideally 25 feet long, if you have it.

coalesce.title: Learn to Juggle with BeLove
coalesce.event_description: If you want to learn my juggling basics or If you know how to juggle and want something new to work on.. this is the event for you! Or just come hang and juggle with me! Come and go as you please! YAY JUGGLING! (I have lots of balls or you can BYOB(alls))

coalesce.title: BINGO at the Tiki Lounge
coalesce.event_description: Get yer BINGO on at the Funky Tiki Ohana Resort!

coalesce.title: The Cloak and Stagger Tavern
coalesce.event_description: Alcoholic Potions, Non-Alcoholic Concoctions and Libations, Drunken Fae, Side Quests, and MORE!

coalesce.title: Mystical Kitty's Meowgickal Tarot Readings
coalesce.event_description:
Mystical Kitty is a renowned fortune teller at Lucky Lake. With her piercing cat-eyed vision and 100% legit magical powers, she will tell your fortune using a custom deck of tarot cards. So custom, in fact, that YOU may be asked to create a card yourself using your OWN meowgickal powers. 

You can find this mystical priestess wearing flowing robes and cat ears at Site 88, close to the peninsula (she also may wander.)

coalesce.title: The Oracles of Sybil
coalesce.event_description: Curious what the future holds? Need advice from your higher self? Come consult the cards.  Get a reading or use one of the decks available to read for yourself or others!

coalesce.title: PB&J BAR - THE QUEST FOR SANDWICH
coalesce.event_description: Join us at Camp Side Quest for a myriad of pb&j sandwich options. Gluten free options will be available. Kid friendly!

coalesce.title: Dixon's Violin Sunset on Orenda
coalesce.event_description: We are thrilled to welcome back visionary violinist, Dixon's Violin! We invite all flow artists to participate as Dixon plays a live electric violin set, as the sun sets on Orenda.

coalesce.title: Japanese Punk and Beer Hour
coalesce.event_description: Enjoy an hour of raw noise, from Bloody Summer to Burning Spirits sounds. With beer!

coalesce.title: Boats!
coalesce.event_description: MEOW*TOWN Marina will be offering boat rides at wildly unpredictable times. Escape the chaos of the burn with a relaxing boat ride from here to there. Check the sandwich board to find out when rides are being offered.

coalesce.title: Dance Techniques for Flow Artists
coalesce.event_description: Dance technique for flow artists:   Do you lose your balance when you're getting deep into your flow? Do you ever feel like your arms just kinda... do whatever? Our Dance Daddy has just what you need to polish those raw movement skills to shiny perfection.

coalesce.title: Open Jam Space
coalesce.event_description: The mics are live.  Use our instruments (keyboard, guitars, uke, bass, drums) or bring your own. Bring your friends and rock out.

coalesce.title: Midnight Donuts
coalesce.event_description: We’re back! Those crazy gnomes are closing up shop Thursday evening for a spell to prepare for this holey magical cake event. Be sure and make your way over before the clock strikes midnight to insure you don’t miss out. (Word has it there might be a line)

coalesce.title: The POC Cookout - 4th Annual
coalesce.event_description:
Introducing the 4th Annual POC Cookout. Join us for a day of community as we celebrate the diversity and richness of our cultures. This year's cookout promises to be bigger and better than the last. Come prepared to connect with old friends and make new ones. We'll have plenty of delicious food, dope music, and interactive activities for all ages! 

This annual multicultural meetup is more than just having a good time. It's about building a community that supports and uplifts one another. It's about creating a space where people of color and supportive allies can come together and celebrate our experiences, our struggles, and our shared triumphs. All are welcome to immerse with people of color.

So whether you're looking for a chance to connect with other people of color or you’re a supportive ally, the 4th Annual POC Cookout is the place to be. Don't miss out on this radically diverse community event!
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Decommodification RAID
coalesce.event_description: Did you know that the best beer, liquor, juice, food, and camping supplies are all from the same excellent brand? are you one of the cool kids wanting to to spread the word of your favorite burning brand? Join Brought To You By ClearanceRainbow.Gay as we decommodify the lake. Thursday join us at the Gayborhood: Castro to catch camps from the Effegy to the keyhole and Saturday at the Gayborhood: East Village for the keyhole east and change those boring default world brands to the best on Lucky Lake!

coalesce.title: Kawaii Ultra Lounge [Dance||Ramen||Cocktails]
coalesce.event_description:
This is where your evening morphs into an adventure, diving into bowls of divine Japanese ramen, brimming with toppings. Make sure you've spotted our glimmering neon ramen sign, it's our secret symbol that the ramens about to start serving!

Drown your senses in our expertly mixed specialty cocktails, crafted  for your enjoyment. Then, find your groove and sway to the rhythm of our heart-thumping beats, delivered live and direct from both in person residents & the from the virtual wonderland of VRChat with the talented KTID crew.

2023 has brought a dazzling new feature! Experience the thrill of a two-way portal, opening doors to interactions across dimensions. It's a whole new way to connect, mingle, and Kanpai to life! Come on in, the party's waiting!

coalesce.title: Bigfoot Sightings 101 with Don Juanito!

See the fruits of the circle of life tree. It will blossom banannas and rum for those who participate in the sacred circle dance hulala. Hula hoop follow along, Beachin' beats, banannas & rum.
Bring your hula hoops or borrow some.

coalesce.title: Get Lit LED Takeover

coalesce.title: First Fire Jam @ The Fae "Forbidden" Stage

Join us Saturday afternoon for a scoop of creamy goodness sandwiched between 2 fresh baked cookies. Get ‘em while you can, they won’t last. We’re also teaming up with those caffeinators, Snackdaddy and Midwhippet (aka Stellar Espress-o from Lakes in Space) to give you a boost with some espresso and maybe even an affogato

coalesce.title: Center Stage - Open Mic

coalesce.title: Bar & Hookah
coalesce.event_description: Step through the threshold into our magical garden and sip on some of the finest floral cocktails and mocktails in the land. Stick around and indulge in stories and smoke with hookah.

coalesce.title: Crystal Chakra Meditation
coalesce.event_description: Last 3+ years completely f*cked up your Chakras? Then come join us in the Sacred Source tent at Valhalla to help open up your energy flow through a guided meditation! Crystals available upon request. Yoga mats will be provided.

coalesce.title: Crystal Chakra Meditation
coalesce.event_description: Last 3+ years completely f*cked up your Chakras? Then come join us in the Sacred Source tent at Valhalla to help open up your energy flow through a guided meditation! Crystals available upon request. Yoga mats will be provided.

coalesce.title: Nudes and Noodles
coalesce.event_description:
Ramen served the way nature intended, by attractive naked people. Enjoy on a grilled cheese or the standard way with broth. 

Vegetarian and gluten-free when standard!

coalesce.title: S'moresbord
coalesce.event_description: Enjoy a buffet of sweet and savory delicacies paired with toasted marshmallows and graham crackers. (Vegan options will be included)

coalesce.title: Gay Grilled Cheese
coalesce.event_description: Grilled cheese with a variety of miscellaneous fruits or meats or other food items combined by very stoned sluts and also cooked and served by sluts! Mid afternoonish ending promptly at burn o’clock!

coalesce.title: Boogie Woogie Figure Drawing
coalesce.event_description: Come join us to make some art and listen to some sweet tunes with Spencer and Friends! We've hosted figure drawing with a live model every Lakes since 2018 and we're back at it again! Art supplies provided

coalesce.title: Slutty Fire Circle
coalesce.event_description: Come to our garden to see if we’re home, take off your clothes and feel free to roam. Bring your props and your imagination too! We’re ready to be sexy with you!

coalesce.title: UpsideDown Tea Party
coalesce.event_description: Starting with a BURNDAY countdown and ending with a tea party that will have your tastebuds confused and delighted!

coalesce.title: dcbbq beach meat
coalesce.event_description: dcbbq's Beach Meat pop-up BBQ potluck party crashes San Escobar.  Come *sample* our delicious smoked bbq (while supplies last).   Participants are encouraged to bring something tasty to share, and we do mean tasty.
