coalesce.title: Smutton Buttons
coalesce.event_description: Come browse or porno and plant magazines! Find your favorite 3" circular picture! Cutout some words to glue on or decorate it however you please and make it into a 3" button! There will be sluts to help you every step of the way 😉

coalesce.title: Big Lebowski White Russian Party
coalesce.event_description: Come hang with the dude, have a caucasian, and see how our rug pulls the whole camp together.

coalesce.title: ⚡️Shuttlecock Rock CAMP-ionship! 🏸
coalesce.event_description: Join LoF's 1st Amateur Badminton CAMP-ionship. Bring a friend and sign up at our SuperBar to accept the challenge. Do y'all have what it takes to be a Top Cock? 🏸 Then stay for after-party.

coalesce.title: Lakes of Fire Triathlon
coalesce.event_description:
Swim, run, bike! Join us for the 5th annual lakes of fire mini triathlon! You don’t need to be a triathlete for this event, finish at your own pace. Bring a floatation device if you want! We start at the effigy.
First, swim across the lake 176.57 meters.
Then, run from north beach to the effigy 0.7miles
Then bike the loop around lucky lake 1.1miles 
And finally, cross the finish line, get your medal and join us for snacks and drinks!!

coalesce.title: Pancakes and maybe drama
coalesce.event_description: Do you like gourmet pancakes with exotic ingredients that are free of drama? TOO BAD. THEY'RE NOT HERE THIS YEAR. We've got regular pancakes with butter and maple syrup, and they are delicious. Also we've never done this before, so maybe a little drama. Come get some at Sound Garden!

coalesce.title: Bike Repair and Adjustments
coalesce.event_description: Got a flat or bike is making odd noises swing by Bikes and brews. We have patch kits, tubes and odds and ends to get help you on your way.

coalesce.title: Flamingo Friday
coalesce.event_description:
Beach, house music, pink cocktails and Flamingos! Flock to Bunny Camp in your best Flamingo-inspired attire for a late afternoon tropical cocktail (3-ish). Perhaps you’ll find something to add to your Flamingo costume from Bunny Camp’s costume closet? Around 4-ish our Flamingo entourage and mobile bar will pass by Flamingolo to collect more Flamingo Friends en route to the beach. House music beats, sunshine, and Flamingo Floaties on the lake! Let's paint the town pink!
(Flamingo Friday started totally by accident at the Defected Croatia house music festival in 2018 and has become an annual tradition there ever since. We've decided to bring FF to LOF for the first time!)

coalesce.title: COSMIC DISCO DJ'S
coalesce.event_description: A high energy party  in the Cosmic Disco Dome with multiple DJs Wednesday thru Saturday night.  Event starts at 9pm , with random day time dj Sessions

coalesce.title: Onsite bike share
coalesce.event_description:
Bikes and brews is happy to return with our infamous bike share to lakes. How it works is simple. Find one of our Orange Bikes with our logos on them, ride it to where you need to go. Then leave it in a public space ( preferably in one of our provided racks) for someone else to enjoy.  
Please don't lock up our bikes or keep them in camp,  the grease fairies have sawzalls, cordless grinders, and bad boundaries when it comes to their bikes, plus they love making sparks...

coalesce.title: Hobbit Feast
coalesce.event_description: Our days together is far too short a time to live among such excellent and admirable folk. We don't know half of you half as well as we should like, but come eat and drink elevensies with us, and we'll come out the other end better for having shared a meal. Gluten-Free and Vegan options will be available.

coalesce.title: Garden of Games
coalesce.event_description: Enjoy some garden-themed games in the Sound Garden. Everdell, Morels, Go Stop, Photosynthesis, and more .. plus stained glass themed Sagrada in homage to our handpainted seed sanctuary.

coalesce.title: Coffee with Daddy-O
coalesce.event_description: Morning coffee chitchat and crossword puzzles with the Dads at Dad camp. Come start your day with some sage advice from Daddy-O!

coalesce.title: Magical Manual Machine
coalesce.event_description: Do you seek Balance? Test your skills on Badgers Magical Manual Machine! You may be asking WTF is a manual.. Think of is as the Wheelie's chill cousin. Kick back and find your balance point without the fear of looping out.

coalesce.title: Femme Funk Friday
coalesce.event_description: Come shake your booty down. We gonna put the f-u-n in FUNKY. An all female-led DJ dance party to shimmy your A$$.

coalesce.title: Monster Handlers Untamed
coalesce.event_description: Was the Beast your first crush? Wanna tell us about it? Come join like-minded Monster Lovers for a few hours. We'll talk about the latest Monster (partner) of the week, drink tea and have light snacks, and quite possibly, be brave enough to read some monster smut aloud.

coalesce.title: Not So Early Bird Yoga w/ Phoenix
coalesce.event_description: Mindful and moderate : All experience levels welcome.

coalesce.title: Bike Repair Basics
coalesce.event_description:
Discussion and skill share.  Learn to do a preride inspection and basic repair skills to keep your bike riding smoothly or on playa. 
CHECK SIGN @ BIKES & BREW for times.

coalesce.title: Want to Mountain Bike like a Badass?
coalesce.event_description:
Tired of just cruising and riding the road?  Looking for an adrenaline rush surrounded by beautiful nature? Come learn some basics of handling a bike on trail and ask  about what makes mountain biking THE BEST. And, of course, safety third -   Everyone is welcome and no bike is needed. Hosted by Funshine, a badass mountain biker and certified mtb coach.  
CHECK SIGN @ BIKES &BREW for times

coalesce.title: Magic: The Gathering
coalesce.event_description: Casual play, Commander and Modern formats. Can teach new players and we have plenty of decks available to borrow.

coalesce.title: Karaoke. at Cosmic Disco
coalesce.event_description: Stop by the Cosmic Disco Thursday from 7pm to 9pm for some fun Karaoke

coalesce.title: Drum Ensemble with Condor
coalesce.event_description: Bring your own drum, learn authentic improvisational techniques and rhythms straight outta ghana

coalesce.title: Burner Widow Happy Hour
coalesce.event_description: Bummed because your partner is a lead or a super volunteer? Feeling left behind? We have a happy hour JUST for you!

coalesce.title: S'mores and Fireside Stories
coalesce.event_description: Come roast marshmallows, chill, & hear & tell tales! We have makings & equipment but feel free to bring your own!

coalesce.title: Mr. Roger's After Dark Presents: Hookahs and Hotties
coalesce.event_description:
The Neighborhood of Make Believe is excited to bring you, for one night only, an evening of wonder and titillation. 
Hookahs, fog, and chill ambient lighting will help to set the mood as you let our sensual DJs gently ease you into blissful auditory submission with the funkiest bass and freshest beats. 
An assortment of teas, including non-caffeinated and mystical varietals, and hot cocktails will be served at our bar for those looking to enhance their temporal experience. 
Adults only. No children or Ben Kelly Ivory will be admitted for this soiree. 
Warning: Spice and weirdness levels may reflect the participants imaginations. 
Prepare to be our neighbor.

coalesce.title: Seed Shrine- Green Fairy Seed Library
coalesce.event_description: Please enter our illuminated shrine, a tribute to nature’s glory and receive a gift of seeds or share your own as well. Our helpful (though mischievous) Green Fairies come and go, but the Seed Library and contemplative space are always open. We’ll leave the light on for you.

coalesce.title: Get Gussied Up with the Goons!
coalesce.event_description: Grandma's Closet will be open all weekend, but stop on over on Burn Night between 4pm and 8pm to get Gussied Up with the Goons! We will have make-up, applicators, and shimmery goods to help you achieve the look that you've never been brave enough to try; Kit will be there for color consultations and advice on application techniques.

coalesce.title: dammit, it's my birthday!
coalesce.event_description: It's our Mayor's birthday!! Come celebrate dammit in all xeir glory as xey turn a ripe peachy 43. Is it your birthday too? We'll help celebrate YOU!

coalesce.title: Brand New Lakes of Fire Acculturation Walkabout
coalesce.event_description: Let's meet up at the Nexus on Friday 14th at 1pm. If you are new participant and want to see how Lakes of Fire works a little behind the scenes what we can show you. Join us for a walkabout around the lake and getting to know what Lakes of Fire is about.  We will be making stops at different departments and you can ask questions and maybe volunteer with them in the future. We will also stop at several different theme camps and get to know them and ask how did them come about or how they were formed?

coalesce.title: Extra Drama Pancakes
coalesce.event_description: You're mama saved the drama, and we're serving it up in pancake form.

coalesce.title: We're Here, We're Queer, Let's Talk About It
coalesce.event_description: Hey fam, it's scary out there. From attacks on trans folx to well... *gestures at everything*... is there no safe space to be LGBTQIA+ anymore? Hell yeah there is. Come to the Gayborhood, Castro District and get your Radical Inclusion on. We'll be holding space for all your big queer feelings with a discussion and dry social hour every night at 7. Be seen, be heard, be loved!

coalesce.title: Guardin' Gnomes and Dino Suit parade
coalesce.event_description: Calling all Inflatable Dinos and Gnome(s) large and small.  From the creators of the award-winning baby shark dance parade comes a unique experience your whole camp will just *love*.  What do you get when a bunch of LoF kids you mix "Guardin' Gnomes" (you know, like, guards) with Inflatable Dino suits and send them on a morning parade around the Lake?

coalesce.title: dcbbq beach meat
coalesce.event_description: Introducing Beach Meat, the dcbbq pop-up BBQ potluck party.  Come *sample* our delicious smoked bbq (while supplies last).   Participants are encouraged to bring something tasty (food, drink, music, dance party, etc) to share, and we do mean tasty.

coalesce.title: Birthday Daddy's Birthday Party
coalesce.event_description: Come eat some of Pop's famous chili dogs or get one of birthday daddies slap shots. Our favorite party animals to cruise by will receive a special gift from Father. Join us in lawn games and a special chegging competition. We will also have Pop Pops airbrush art machine goin'! Get a tattoo or eat some cupcakes at the Birthday party!

coalesce.title: The Crying Cowboy Catharsis Hours
coalesce.event_description: Come and bask in the cathartic sounds of the saddest country songs I could find. Talk about what all's got y'down or just hold space for someone else. Maybe get or give a hug. Cry. Tissues will be provided.

coalesce.title: Introductory Consent Discussion
coalesce.event_description: Looking to touch up your grasp on consent, see if you can find something new to cook your noodle on, or have never taken a consent course before? Join Rivet and Pumpkin as they go through the basic concepts of consent and interpersonal negotiation frameworks. This will be a broad walkthrough followed by an open discussion and Q&A. Listing marked as 18+ because adult themes are present in this discussion. Under 18 welcome at guardian's discretion.

coalesce.title: 2023 Lakes of Fire Volunteer Appreciation Party
coalesce.event_description: Come grab a tasty frozen treat (vegan/dairy free options available) and/or a delicious drink (alcoholic and NA options available) and enjoy some quality time with your fellow volunteers!

coalesce.title: Hot Folks Country
coalesce.event_description: 93.3FM KHWK.... This is your Country!!
coalesce.hosting_location: Coco Jumbo National Park , San Escobar

coalesce.title: Zine Library and Giveaway
coalesce.event_description: I collect a lot of zines. All kinds! RPG, comics, photography, etc. Stop by, read some, and take ones you like! Zine swaps welcome.

coalesce.title: POC Coffee + Chat
coalesce.event_description:
Hey Fam!

Come join us for a coffee and chat, POC Decompression on Sunday after Temple Burn, at our place from 10am to 11am.

Next to K1 on the west side of the Keyhole, Goblin Cove - bring your cup and camp chair!

coalesce.title: Neon Cowboy Rope Show
coalesce.event_description:
Join us for a special glow-tastic showcase, featuring (flow / aerial / acro / glowy props / burlesque / etc) performances from Raunch Ranch and pals across Lakes!

Interested in performing? All skill levels are encouraged to strut your stuff (or join the audience). Mosey on down to the Raunch Ranch about an hour after sundown on Friday night (10pm-ish). Bring your UV-reactive glow-in-the-dark flow props, UV-reactive clothes, body paint, etc. and show us what you've got!

We'll have a 10 foot tall aerial suspension frame lit with black lights for you to show off your skills. DJ Syntheticus will be spinning hot beats to keep the energy going (they may be bribed to take song requests). Here's the skinny:
Your act must use UV reactive, glow-in-the-dark, and/or light-up costume and/or props.

Dance, contortion, lyra, trapeze, shibari, burlesque and more are all welcome. No fire or flesh hooks or other biohazard stuff. You don't have to use the suspension frame. Act length 2 minutes to fifteen minutes at the absolute max. 
The lineup will be who shows up, and when it's over, it's over! If you think you'd like to participate, shoot us a note using this form: https://bit.ly/RRneoncowboy

coalesce.title: Giddies up Hoes Down Country Dance Party
coalesce.event_description: Come on and swing yer partner round and round to the tunes that put the boogie in yer boots and make yer nannay go "HOOT". Enjoy a cold vessel of sweet tea or lemonade. Bring your own hooch. we ain't a bar.

coalesce.title: Mystical Menagerie
coalesce.event_description: Come enjoy the local menagerie at Lakes! Participation level is up to you! Are you a people pet or some kind animal people? Do you just like wearing ears or fur? Want to give or receive some head pets? Lounge with us! This is an event for pets, cute ear-wearers, fae or mythical beings of an animal-nature, and their admirers therein! This is an all ages event meant to connect furry-kind for fun, rambunctious play, snacking, head pets, and lounging. Costuming encouraged but definitely not required. Feel free to bring a blanket and a pillow for your comfort, stuffies are very welcome. There will be a Ask-first explicit consent expectation with an active monitor checking in. Under 18 MUST be accompanied by a parent/guardian.

coalesce.title: Cowboy Cinema Double Feature
coalesce.event_description: Come on y'all, get comfy for some classic cowboy films. Movies will be picked from a hat. Enjoy a vessel full of sweet tea or lemonade. Popcorn will be served.

coalesce.title: Tai chi with D
coalesce.event_description: An easy 10-15 minute tai chi session Thursday, Friday and Saturday morning at 11:00am.

coalesce.title: Catface Calzones
coalesce.event_description: Are your whiskers wilting because your food dish is empty? Put some patter back in your paws with a tasty treat. The Purrface Pizza Parlor will be serving a limited number of freshly made Catface Calzones. An even more limited amount of vegan and gluten-free options will be available.

coalesce.title: VeryKateri's DirtyDoll Peepshow
coalesce.event_description:
Psst. Hey.
Wanna see a peepshow?

Check the peephole to see what mischief the dollies have gotten up to in there. 
Or make a new scene! Open for play whenever the dolls feel called to perform. 
The artist creates the dolls, but peepshow scenes are created by dollfans like yourself. Weirdness and spice level will vary based on YOU. 
The dolls usually perform for 18+, but they can do PG shows on request.

coalesce.title: Dumptrucks and Dumplings
coalesce.event_description: Come and get stuffed with some Gyoza-style dumplings! We will have vegan and gluten friendly options as well. Served by our hottest sluts with the biggest butts"

coalesce.title: Enchanted Oasis Lounge Night
coalesce.event_description: Join us for a mesmerizing desert garden-themed lounge night! Sip on refreshing cocktails or mocktails, savor delectable snacks, and lose yourself in enchanting melodies. Immerse yourself in the lush oasis ambiance, complete twinkling lights and the perfect blend of music and culinary delights for an unforgettable evening.

coalesce.title: Coffee Bar
coalesce.event_description: Start your day off right with a warm and inviting atmosphere, infused with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee.Sit back, relax, and enjoy the cozy ambiance as you savor each sip, knowing that you've found the perfect spot to kickstart your morning and embrace the possibilities that lie ahead.

coalesce.title: Garden of Dreams
coalesce.event_description: Come experience an oasis in the middle of the burn. A place for rest, for connection, for relaxation, for imagination. Somewhere to slow down, to recover from sensory overwhelm, to check in with yourself and others. A place for quiet workshops, community gatherings, even for a restorative nap.

coalesce.title: Magical Mushroom Tarot Reading
coalesce.event_description: Find Epiphany For a Magical Mushroom Tarot Reading (they'll be in an Inky Cap Mushroom hat when they have their mushroom deck on hand)

coalesce.title: Oatmeal Bar
coalesce.event_description: Self-serve oatmeal with TONS of healthy (Nutella is made from hazel nuts) and delicious toppings. Come fuel up before you tear down camp! While supplies last.

coalesce.title: Lunch in the Foraging Forest
coalesce.event_description: If you're like the Fuck-It Fairy you like to snack when the mood strikes you.  Come on by for some tasty brownie bites, lemony nibbles, pizza scones, fruit, trial mix, and sandwich sliders.  Mocktails and cocktails available if you're sweet (or salty) enough.

coalesce.title: Bloody Tick Bar
coalesce.event_description:
Ticks don’t just suck, we also make the best Bloody Ticks in town!!! Bring your cup and we will fill it up with all the Bloody Tick goodness! 
TickTown loves you!!!

coalesce.title: Mushroom Hunt
coalesce.event_description: Come visit the Atoms Family and peek around our foraging forest.  A kid-friendly hunt for mushrooms with prizes awaits you!

coalesce.title: Global Booty Dance
coalesce.event_description: Get ready to shake your booty around the world with facilitator Sirène De Paradis. Take flight with this 1hr high energy dance workshop set to some hot global grooves! (Costumes  highly appreciated!)

coalesce.title: Soul's Smokey Shisha Lounge Soiree
coalesce.event_description: Global fusion and ethnic beats with our resident DJs accompanied by hookah pipes and tea in our delicious plounge. The evening will be interspersed by performances of burlesque, and belly dancing. Come relax, chat, vibe or dance - the beats will ramp up towards the end of the night!

coalesce.title: Individualists Vs. The Collectivists: Makeout Game
coalesce.event_description: A consensual makeout kissing game involving identity, missions and foolishness!

coalesce.title: Loud BOOM! again
coalesce.event_description: Approximately 15 minutes till conclave

coalesce.title: Loud BOOM!
coalesce.event_description: Approximately 30 minutes to the start of conclave.

coalesce.title: Uplevelling Touch!
coalesce.event_description: Using Betty Martin’s wheel of Consent as the foundation for more conscious, more pleasurable touch with our in house tantrika.

coalesce.title: Send Your Baggage to Space (Emotional Baggage Claim)
coalesce.event_description: Visit our frequent flyer lounge to write down or draw things you need to release or let go of, and place your sentiments in our confidential emotional baggage briefcase. Using alien technology, we will dispose of your baggage by launching it into the sun (burning it).

coalesce.title: Welcome Gnome !
coalesce.event_description: We’re back and ready to fill your bellies!  We’ll be firing up the oven and welcoming you gnome in true Baked on the Lake fashion. You may even get it to witness the bakery gnomes creating Viking wedding cake magic!

coalesce.title: Wee Effigy
coalesce.event_description: See the Wee Effigies built by various community members emmolated on the North Beach.

coalesce.title: Imperfect Art Hour
coalesce.event_description: Let's get together and make some imperfect art. I had an art teacher yell at me for using a ruler to draw a straight line. Art doesn't need to be perfect to be beautiful and sometimes the desire to make it perfect can hold us back from ever getting started. I will provide some suggestions for simple, imperfect art and provide supplies to get started, or you can bring your own art to work on.

coalesce.title: Show & Tell
coalesce.event_description: Come join us for an hour of family-friendly show and tell. Kids of all ages are welcome to join in on the fun. Participate by bringing a kid friendly item but make sure to hide it in a bag! You will be asked to share three clues about the item and we will all take turns guessing what the item is.

coalesce.title: Star Search
coalesce.event_description: Are you participating in San Escobar's Passport Stamp Exchange?  Earn a stamp from our camp by helping us build the Cathedral of Sorrows & Fears, by plunging your hands into a BITE (Box of Interesting Tactile Experience) to pull out a paper star, by finding a star in our chill space, or by solving our tabletop Maze of Mystery. Or just ask reeeeally nicely.

coalesce.title: Tea Party & Misfortune Cookies
coalesce.event_description: Join the Calico Cats for a tea party! We're all a bit mad here and the fortunes are a bit grim but there will be snacks and tea for all who attend!

coalesce.title: Teeny's Tea Time
coalesce.event_description: Come join our tea soul-liers with our delicious spectrum of teas and have them serve you while you lounge in our plounge.

coalesce.title: VeryKateri's Dirtydoll Peepshow
coalesce.event_description:
An interactive mobile peepshow, run by a group of tiny artdolls who call themselves "Felt Queer". The dolls collaborate with a different human dollfan to pose each new scene. 
Absolutely no touching unless you ASK FIRST and the dolls say YES. 
WARNING: This is an outsourcing mischief project. Spice and weirdness levels will reflect participants imaginations. 
ALSO: 
Some Dolls may bite.

coalesce.title: Lemonade Social
coalesce.event_description:
Are you thirsty? Are you setting up camp and forgot where you put your electrolytes, your sense of humor or your shoes? Come to Drink, Bitch! and get some light snacks, lemonade and spiked lemonade with us! We also have apple pie moonshine to kick off the week :) 
Lemonades available throughout the week as well!

coalesce.title: Gnome away from Home
coalesce.event_description:
Cosmic Disco was on a mission to explore the universe and party likg there's no tomorrow.
One day, our ship was flying through the galaxy when it suddenly encountered a strange gravitational pull.
The spaceship tried to resist, but it was too strong, and it forced us to land on a nearby planet.
Cosmic Disco accidently landed on a small village of gnomes. The little creatures scattered in all directions, frightened by the sound of the ship. The crew of the ship quickly realized what had happened and set out to help find the gnomes and bring them back home.
Cosmic Disco needs help bringing the "Gnomes back Home". If you find a Come anywhere throughout lakes please bring them back to their village and we will give †you an awesome gift for your effort.

coalesce.title: Effigy Fireworks
coalesce.event_description: Fireworks at the Effigy

coalesce.title: Conclave
coalesce.event_description: Fire Spinners dance around the effigy

coalesce.title: Art at the Heart - Open Crafting
coalesce.event_description:
♥️Come put a little art in your heart at Camp Heart On ! Join Art Therapist Mira of Broken Mirror Healing to craft wood and wire hearts wrapped with yarn .

The Opening Ritual will set the intentions for the Burn . It will be an opportunity for an art healing session with Mira , complete with guided meditation and group process . 

Open Crafting throughout the Burn will grow this ongoing piece of Interactive Installation Art . All are welcome and invited to create liberally at our Art Table . We invite the denizens of the forest to come together through this mindful and creative art process and ponder the question:

"What activates your heart ? "

Make a Heart ! Take a Heart ! Leave a Heart ! And let’s weave love in our time together . 
Those doing marriage rituals at the chapel of the heart-shaped arch  are encouraged to wrap a heart representing their love . The Yarn Hearts left with us will be displayed around Camp Heart On as a Community Collaborative Art Piece , growing in size and complexity throughout the Burn . 

The Closing Ritual will tie everything together and involve a ceremonial burn of some of the hearts . Come get your art on ! ♥️


Opening Ritual : July 12th . 
Open Crafting : Throughout the Burn . 
Closing Ritual : July 15th  .

coalesce.title: Art at the Heart - Opening Ritual
coalesce.event_description:
♥️Come put a little art in your heart at Camp Heart On ! Join Art Therapist Mira of Broken Mirror Healing to craft wood and wire hearts wrapped with yarn .

The Opening Ritual will set the intentions for the Burn . It will be an opportunity for an art healing session with Mira , complete with guided meditation and group process . 

Open Crafting throughout the Burn will grow this ongoing piece of Interactive Installation Art . All are welcome and invited to create liberally at our Art Table . We invite the denizens of the forest to come together through this mindful and creative art process and ponder the question:

Make a Heart ! Take a Heart ! Leave a Heart ! And let’s weave love in our time together . 
Those doing marriage rituals at the chapel of the heart-shaped arch  are encouraged to wrap a heart representing their love . The Yarn Hearts left with us will be displayed around Camp Heart On as a Community Collaborative Art Piece , growing in size and complexity throughout the Burn . 

The closing ritual will tie everything together and involve a ceremonial burn of some of the hearts . Come get your art on ! ♥️


Opening Ritual : July 12th . 
Open Crafting : Throughout the Burn . 
Closing Ritual : July 15th  .

coalesce.title: Rose, Bud, Thorn
coalesce.event_description: Looking for some wholesome connections and a safe space to share? We want to know what’s going on in your world! Tell us what you’re excited about (your "rose"), what's "budding" in your life right now, and what feels like a "thorn" in your side. We will circle up and put our active listening hats on as each person shares, judgment free!

coalesce.title: Random Talent Show
coalesce.event_description: Have a secret opera skill? Can you lick your elbow and want everyone to know it? Whatever your random talent, come on down to Camp Squish and show it off. You can come sign up in the Lounge, or you can chicken-wing it… We celebrate talents of all variety and encourage you to do the same. Show us what you've got and let's celebrate your superstar talent.

coalesce.title: COT13U Ceremonial Celebration
coalesce.event_description: 1300 hours is when all devotees gather as a Blessing (herd of unicorns) to celebrate the magic of unicorns, witness to all present, sing our Neighmaste Blessing hymn with a dose of silliness in mind. Immediately following he service food like substances with be offered to participants. Saturday

coalesce.title: COT13U Deliverance to the Blessing Ceremony
coalesce.event_description: our 1300 hours Ceremonial Celebration on Saturday will include an induction ceremony for new devotees we have recruited to our cult, ... we mean our church, followed by a reception. Please join us for ceremonial shenanigans that include communion of the body and blood of our Sacred 13th, Ophiuchus.

coalesce.title: Late Night Story Hour
coalesce.event_description: Wanna be a horizontal potato in your onesie in a comfy lounge space? Do you want to enthusiastically be read storybooks and fairytales while you're in a consentual cuddle puddle? Camp Squish is hosting Late Night Story Book hour where we will be reading children's books theatrically for all to enjoy! Pajamas, stuffies, and all things cozy are encouraged to be brought!

coalesce.title: SUP on Lucky Lake
coalesce.event_description: Want to get on the water but *theoretically* don't want to get wet? Depending on your ability to balance you can make this happen! Borrow our paddle boards for a bit or we can teach you, time permitting. You must know how to swim and be able to speak your name without slurring your words to take the boards out. Daylight hours!

coalesce.title: Social Dance
coalesce.event_description: Grab consent and then grab a partner because it's about time you learned some dance moves! Explore some basic steps of swing and ballroom dances to help keep those moves on the floor nice and smooth.

coalesce.title: Yarting with Goblins
coalesce.event_description:
"Come make some yarn art with Archivist, Spudz, and Zoe from 4-5pm. 
Bring a project to work on or learn to knit or crochet with us (we'll have a few supplies available!)  "

coalesce.title: Snickerin’ Tick Tavern
coalesce.event_description: The bar is open, come on in and Spin the Wheel!  Your favorite cocktails will be served as well as some brand new ones. TickTown loves you!

coalesce.title: Tick inspections/removal
coalesce.event_description:
Got the creepy crawlies?  Maybe a little fella latched on for a suck?  We can help!  All the Ticks in camp have skills when it comes to finding and removing our wee brethren.
TickTown loves you!!

coalesce.title: Open Mic Night at Vibratorium!!!
coalesce.event_description: Play an instrument?  want to sing, read some poetry, tell a joke or amusing story?  Stop by Vibratorium and sign-up!  We'll post the sign-up board at the Freaq Tavern Wednesday afternoon and leave it up until it's full!  We'll have some microphones & a keyboard.  Check with us on Wednesday and see what else might be available.

coalesce.title: Welcome Home Wednesday!
coalesce.event_description:
Vibratorium welcomes burners home and introduces the camp to the community at Lakes of Fire.

Weary travelers can have a drink at The Freaq Tavern and take a break from setting up their homes.

Get a sage bath or a sound blessing to help leave the default where it belongs!

Or…  Just chill in our 26-foot diameter dome structure, listen to the plants sing, and take a load off…

coalesce.title: 99 Cans of Beer on the Wall
coalesce.event_description: A sing along with 99 of our closest friends... and beer!

coalesce.title: You Pick It Double Feature
coalesce.event_description: You pick the Garden themed films we'll play on our big screen following the effigy burn on Saturday. Vote via our Facebook pole on the the LOF group page or in person at Videogasm.

coalesce.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show with The Seductive Transducers LIVE
coalesce.event_description: Videogasm presents The Seductive Transducers in their third year of performing The Rocky Horror Picture Show at LOF! Come and yell obscenities at our lovely shadow cast as we pretend to be lovebirds, aliens and professors. Audience participation is GREATLY encouraged!

coalesce.title: The Garden of Wonderful Ramen
coalesce.event_description: Master chef LukaPalooka will be dishing up a culinary delight served at sunset in the Garden of Wonderful Ramen where the noodles are plentiful and the chopsticks are yours to keep!

coalesce.title: Sleepy Pickle Lounge Happy Hour
coalesce.event_description:
Videogasm's Happy Hour with different daily theme music, drink and appetizer specials...
Gong Show Karaoke! Sing well, get a pickleback! Not so well, get GONGED! and choke a shot of Malort!

coalesce.title: Silent Disco by Spinner D
coalesce.event_description:
Come and get your Groove on!!  Bring your phone to scan the QR code and your BT headphones and join us in the inaugural Silent Disco!  We’ll be booty shaking our way to the Effigy for an all out dance party.
TickTown loves you! Can you dig it?

coalesce.title: Wafflegasm
coalesce.event_description: Sample delicious brunch favorites from our Wafflebar,  including all the toppings we can imagine. Hambo will be sacrificing himself on the alter of meats to provide scrapple, sausage and other brunch meats! (Veggie options available too!) Boozy and non-boozy libations will flow freely while supplies last!

coalesce.title: PAINFUL “Temporary Tattoos”
coalesce.event_description: ADULTS ONLY!! Daddy Space Kitty will be giving precision welts with his simple yet fiendishly effective rubber band hoop. Basic welt lines with rubber bands. Can do writing. Spankings and/or Latex free bands available upon request.

coalesce.title: Sound Blessings
coalesce.event_description: Come by and get your chakras aligned and your qi moving with a quickie sound blessing: Fork, Gong, or Solar Bell.

coalesce.title: Open Mats
coalesce.event_description:
HI, y’all Pickles will be hosting open mats, For beginners or those experienced in Muay Thai and Jiujitsu. Bring your Gis, rash guards, or gloves for some time at the violent safe space!! Have extra
 equipment if needed.

coalesce.title: Woozle your Boozle
coalesce.event_description: Join us every evening around 6ish (burner time) for fancy cocktails and non-alcoholic mocktails till they're gone.

coalesce.title: SIDE QUESTS OF WONDER
coalesce.event_description: Find one of our NPCs roaming Lucky Lake or stop by our camp to receive a side quest of your VERY OWN. Snark, tomfoolery, and general chaos should be expected. Rewards given upon completion (of quests).

coalesce.title: Mid-day Meditative Sound Bath
coalesce.event_description: Bring a blanket or yoga mat, lay down, and chillax for a spell and let vibrations wash away the world.

coalesce.title: Midnight Waffles
coalesce.event_description: At the darkest hour, enjoy a fluffy warm waffle or two!  Limited gluten free and vegan options will be available.

coalesce.title: DND One-Shot for Beginners
coalesce.event_description: Your group seeks entrance to Candlekeep, a centuries old, magical library, seeking aid for a stricken town. The only person who can help you is a sage named Matreous....but will you find him in time? Will he help you if you do?

coalesce.title: Breakfast All Day
coalesce.event_description: Do you like breakfast foods? Well, we like breakfast foods and if you're lucky you might just wander in while we're serving hella breakfast foods. Some time around burner o'clock noonish we're wrasslin up some breakfast crunchwraps for your travel brekky pleasure and then swing through again before sundown for French toast with carmelized peaches. Is there something you want to cook up? Flag down our chef of the day Rivet, heap creative compliments on her cooking prowess, and she just might cook it up for you.

coalesce.title: Snack Snacks at Space Space
coalesce.event_description: The universe is expanding... but your tummy needn't be a black hole. Pick up a wee snack or refresh your vessel on your way to the effigy with a Snack Snack at Space Space! If we're around, come and sit a spell, weary traveler. If not, feel free to take what you need and carry on. We'll do our best to keep it stocked with various items as supplies and spoons allow. There may be extras on packpack-out day, you never know.

coalesce.title: Spice World Buffet
coalesce.event_description: Swing by Spice World for hot sauces, hot snacks, hot friends and other spicy fun. We also have a Spice Girls selfie station. We'll have Micheladas and bloody Marys some mornings.

coalesce.title: Breakfast in the Foraging Forest
coalesce.event_description: Beat the heat with a nice, cold treat.  The Atoms Family will be serving up a breakfast bar with Greek yogurt, mini waffle cones, dried fruit, honey, maple syrup, and granola.  Bring a cup and get a drink while you're at it.

coalesce.title: Solar Power For Camping
coalesce.event_description:
Come find out how to build an affordable solar electric system.
Charge your cell phone, play some tunes and light your tent without spending a lot of money.  Or run your CPAP machine and blender or even an off grid camper or cabin without running a generator. We'll talk about performance, reliability, and value.   We'll look at examples, see what’s new, and discuss your applications.

coalesce.title: Cinnamony Roll-Licious!
coalesce.event_description: Fresh baked cinnamon rolls til they're gone!

coalesce.title: Sausage Party
coalesce.event_description: Oh yes, it's time... but not for what you're thinking. Get ready to indulge in mouthwatering sausages, straight off the grill, with a wide array condoments. Everyone welcome, join us for a sizzling soirée like no other--the ultimate Sausage Party!

coalesce.title: Teen Dance Party
coalesce.event_description: Calling all teens!  Come dance your hearts out to the selections of Give Love Jive, our trio of teen DJs.  Keep your energy up with provided snacks and mocktails.

coalesce.title: Kraken Floats
coalesce.event_description: Frozen Kraken Creamery will be serving root beer floats - alcoholic and non - from our bar.

coalesce.title: Omelet Breakfast
coalesce.event_description:
Cook-to-order omelets.
If you've visited Dive Camp in the past, you know the drill.  If not, come check it out: write your name on a freezer bag, add eggs, choose your favorite ingredients, and visit with your fellow burners while it boils into yummy burrito-ready goodness.  Tortillas and hot sauce provided.  Some vegetarian options are available.  We'll be doing ~50 omelets a day 9-ish to 11-isk (or when the eggs are gone).  Look for the red and white dive flag.

coalesce.title: Pop Up Swamp Snacks
coalesce.event_description: Snap, Crackle, Pop-Up snacks can happen any time the open sign is on!

coalesce.title: Tennis Ball Castle Crash
coalesce.event_description: Get ready for an exciting and competitive game of Tennis Ball Castle Crash! In this activity, participants build elaborate castles using cardboard boxes and other materials, and then strategically launch tennis balls to knock down their opponents' castles. The objective is to aim accurately, strategize your shots, and use teamwork to defend your own castle while demolishing the rival structures, leading to an action-packed and exhilarating game that combines creativity, precision, and friendly competition.

coalesce.title: Desert Oasis Garden Snow Cone Party
coalesce.event_description: Escape to a desert oasis at our themed party! Indulge in icy snow cones, non-alcoholic or spiked with boozy flavors. Immerse yourself in the enchanting ambiance of vibrant cacti, luscious succulents, and twinkling lights, creating a cool and captivating celebration.

coalesce.title: Tunnel of Wonder
coalesce.event_description: Come to Drink Bitch's Tunnel of Wonder after dark to paint with light! Use our UV flashlights to create your own art on glow in the dark canvases.  We used the glowiest glow paint to make your drawings shine. There is a chill tent at the end of the tunnel with floor cushions that *may* be air conditioned during the day.

coalesce.title: Prankster Happy Hour at The Freaq Tavern!!
coalesce.event_description: Stop by for a drink, some music and a tune-up!  21+ drinks and non-alcoholic beverages to wet your whistle.  Sonic tune-ups, bar games and general dumbassery.  Check your 6 'cuz anything can happen.  Practical Jokes, tricks and goofery will occur.  Bring your good nature & trust in humanity, we love easy targets!

coalesce.title: Kawaii Ultra Lounge [Dance||Cocktails]
coalesce.event_description:
Get ready to be swept off your feet with our sensational array of specialty cocktails, each one a unique blend of flavors designed to tantalize your taste buds. And as the neon lights flicker on, you know the party's about to get started!

Lose yourself in the infectious beats pumped out live and direct from both our IRL residents & from the virtual universe of VRChat by the unstoppable KTID Crew. Dance, laugh, and immerse yourself in the rhythm of the night.

Brace yourself for the newest sensation of 2023 - a two-way portal for interdimensional interactions! Connect, communicate, and celebrate in a way you've never done before. So, what are you waiting for? Join the party at K16 and let's raise a toast to life. Kanpai!
